actions.text: Measure called up as privileged matter in House.

official_title: A resolution naming majority members to various Standing Committees.

summary.text: Elects Members, Delegates and a Resident Commissioner to the following standing committees of the House of Representatives: (1) Agriculture; (2) Appropriations; (3) Armed Services; (4) Banking, Finance and Urban Affairs; (5) District of Columbia; (6) Education and Labor; (7) Government Operations; (8) House Administration; (9) Interior and Insular Affairs; (10) International Relations; (11) Interstate and Foreign Commerce; (12) Judiciary; (13) Merchant Marine and Fisheries; (14) Post Office and Civil Service; (15) Public Works and Transportation; (16) Rules; (17) Science and Technology; (18) Small Business; (19) Standards of Official Conduct; (20) Veteran's Affairs; and (21) Ways and Means.

titles.title: A resolution naming majority members to various Standing Committees.
